text: Maher Al-Sayed (; born 13 March 1979 in Damascus, Syria) is a former Syrian football player who used to play for Al-Wahda and Al-Jaish in the Syrian League. ==International Career Stats== ===Goals for Senior National Team=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
